column2: Osisko Gold Royalties Ltd. operates as an intermediate metal company, which engages in mining and exploration. The company is headquartered in Montreal, Quebec and currently employs 40 full-time employees. The firm holds a North American focused portfolio of over 135 royalties, streams and precious metal offtakes. The firm holds 20 producing assets including the net smelter return royalty on the Canadian Malartic gold mine in Malartic, Quebec and royalty on the Eleonore gold mine located in James Bay, Quebec.
